mapper.insert: insert into contest(company_id, contest_title, contest_startDate, contest_endDate, contest_field, contest_hireNumber, contest_contents, manager_name, team_name, manager_email, manager_tel) values(#{company_id}, #{contest_title}, #{contest_startDate}, #{contest_endDate}, #{contest_field}, #{contest_hireNumber}, #{contest_contents}, #{manager_name}, #{team_name}, #{manager_email}, #{manager_tel})
mapper.select: select contest_id, company_id, contest_title, contest_startDate, contest_endDate, contest_field, contest_hireNumber, contest_contents, manager_name, team_name, manager_email, manager_tel, contest_status, company_name from contest natural join company_info where contest_id = #{contest_id}
select auto_increment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'playdataar3' and table_name = 'contest'

select contest_id, company_id, contest_title, contest_startDate,contest_endDate, contest_field, contest_hireNumber, contest_contents, manager_name, team_name, manager_email, manager_tel, contest_status from contest where company_id = #{company_id}
order by contest_id desc

select contest_id, company_id, contest_title, contest_startDate, contest_endDate, contest_field, contest_hireNumber, contest_contents, manager_name, team_name, manager_email, manager_tel, contest_status, company_name from contest natural join company_info where contest_status = 'Y'
order by contest_id desc
select count(*) from contest natural join company_info where contest_status='Y'
